name: PUT - Update User with invalid data -- @1.4

steps.name: When I do a "PUT" request to "usuario" endpoint with "invalid_given_administrador" data
Then the status code should be "400"
And the "administrador" with "administrador deve ser 'true' ou 'false'" is on response body
